publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5494.3 Richard Lochhead: Green Procurementâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-5494) in the name of Patrick Harvie, insert at end "and further calls on the Executive to report to the Parliament, prior to dissolution, providing details of any measures taken, and their results, in response to the call made by the Environment and Rural Development Committee in its report published in May 2005 for public procurement to be used to tackle climate change."
